00119 INLINE Eeprom * EEPROM_CAST_KBLOCK(KBlock *blk)
00120 {
00121     ASSERT(blk->priv.type == KBT_EEPROM);
00122     return (Eeprom *)blk;
00123 }

00166 DEPRECATED INLINE bool eeprom_verify_3(Eeprom *eep, const void *buf, size_t count)
00167 {
00168     return eeprom_verify_4(eep, (e2addr_t)eep->fdblk.fd.seek_pos, buf, count);
00169 }
00170 DEPRECATED INLINE void eeprom_init_4(Eeprom *eep, EepromType type, e2dev_addr_t addr, bool verify)
00171 {
00172     eeprom_init_5(eep, &local_i2c_old_api, type, addr, verify);
00173     kfileblock_init(&eep->fdblk, &eep->blk);
00174 }
